p: This Section provides the methodology of data analytics on COVID-19. For this, different machine learning classifiers can be used. These operations can be done using different programming languages including Python, R-studio, MATLAB, etc. For classification, regression or prediction of a particular problem, feature selection methods can be used to find the features that have the highest impact on that problem [ 28, 29]. Then different classifiers and regression models can be applied to obtain the classification or prediction results [ 28, 29].
